name: PartiCULL
description:
GMTK 2021 Game Jam Submission

Created by Lily Williams, Alex Estell, Brad Hollander, and Jamie Barrett

You are a scientist operating a very expensive laser in a particle accelerator laboratory. Your experiments require you to split molecules up into individual particles, but be careful not to damage your equipment.

Use your laser to split atoms off the molecules, but be careful not to let them hit you!

Keep an eye on your shields on the screen in the bottom left.

Controls:

  • Left/Right or A/D to rotate laser
  • Space to fire laser
  • Enter to start
